00001 #########################################################################
00002 #
00003 #  Implements named constants (e, pi, etc.)
00004 #
00005 package Parser::Constant;
00006 use strict; no strict "refs";
00007 our @ISA = qw(Parser::Item);
00008 
00009 $Parser::class->{Constant} = 'Parser::Constant';
00010 
00011 #
00012 #  If a constant is marked with isConstant, then it will
00013 #  be combined with other constants automatically as formulas
00014 #  are built, so only mark it if you want that to happen.
00015 #
00016 sub new {
00017   my $self = shift; my $class = ref($self) || $self;
00018   my $equation = shift;
00019   my ($name,$ref) = @_;
00020   my $const = $equation->{context}{constants}{$name};
00021   my ($value,$type) = Value::getValueType($equation,$const->{value});
00022   my $c = bless {
00023     name => $name, type => $type, def => $const,
00024     ref => $ref, equation => $equation
00025   }, $class;
00026   $c->weaken;
00027   $c->{isConstant} = 1 if $const->{isConstant};
00028   $equation->{variables} = {%{$equation->{variables}},%{$const->{value}{variables}}}
00029     if Value::isFormula($const->{value});
00030   return $c;
00031 }
00032 
00033 #
00034 #  Return the value of the constant
00035 #    (for formulas, do the same substitutions the are in
00036 #     effect for the main equation).
00037 #
00038 sub eval {
00039   my $self = shift; my $context = $self->context;
00040   my $data = $self->{def}{value};
00041   if (Value::isFormula($data)) {
00042     $data = $data->copy;
00043     $data->{values} = $self->{equation}{values};
00044     $data = $data->{tree}->eval->inContext($context);
00045     return $data;
00046   } elsif (ref($data) eq 'ARRAY') {
00047     $data = [@${data}];
00048     foreach my $x (@{$data}) {$x = $x->copy->inContext($context)}
00049     return @{$data};
00050   } else {
00051     $data = $data->copy->inContext($context) if Value::isValue($data);
00052     return $data;
00053   }
00054 }
00055 
00056 #
00057 #  Use constant to tell if it can be in a union
00058 #
00059 sub canBeInUnion {
00060   my $self = shift;
00061   Value::isValue($self->{def}{value}) && $self->{def}{value}->canBeInUnion;
00062 }
00063 
00064 #
00065 #  Include variables from constant formulas
00066 #
00067 sub getVariables {
00068   my $self = shift; my $data = $self->{def}{value};
00069   return {} unless Value::isFormula($data);
00070   return $data->{tree}->getVariables;
00071 }
00072 
00073 #
00074 #  Return the constant's name
00075 #
00076 sub string {
00077   my $self = shift;
00078   return $self->{def}{string} if defined($self->{def}{string});
00079   return $self->{name}
00080 }
00081 
00082 sub TeX {
00083   my $self = shift; my $name = $self->{name};
00084   return $self->{def}{TeX} if defined($self->{def}{TeX});
00085   $name = $1.'_{'.$2.'}' if ($name =~ m/^(\D+)(\d+)$/);
00086   return $name;
00087 }
00088 
00089 sub perl {
00090   my $self = shift; my $parens = shift;
00091   my $data = $self->{def}{value};
00092   return $self->{def}{perl} if defined($self->{def}{perl});
00093   if (Value::isFormula($data)) {
00094     $data->{values} = $self->{equation}{values};
00095     my $value = $data->{tree}->perl;
00096     $data->{values} = {};
00097     $value = '('.$value.')' if $parens;
00098     return $value;
00099   }
00100   $data = Value::makeValue($data,context=>$self->context);
00101   return $data->perl(@_) if Value::isValue($data);
00102   return '$'.$self->{name};
00103 }

00107 1;
